en: To prepare for taking the **PGCert**, getting a little experience in programming would be very useful. You could self-study a basic programming course in a language like Python or Java. There are lots of resources on-line for this. If you are studying at Auckland, you could consider taking the introductory programming course COMPSCI 101.
